author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Goodbye, Farewell, and Amen.
body:
This is my final post to the Lupin the Third ML for
the next 2+ years. 
I thank you for all your support over the past year or
so as I've worked on my website and so on. 

Some final words:

Bruce: I appreciate the offer to back-up my website!
Please tell me exactly what URL you plan to put the
site on and I'll redirect before I'm gone for good (so
write me REAL SOON, like, within hours if you can). If
you wanna toy with some of the site's features, feel
free (I'm aware of te problem with the Manga index,
but there's nothing I can really do about it now...if
you wanna throw together a replacement, that would be
great!) Keep up the good work.

Luis: Good form. You and Bruce have done a fine job
designing the Encyclopedia. You deserved that AniPike
award! I hope the Yahoo Lupin III Club picks up again
soon. Feel free to make any changes you feel
necessary, as well as kick off any annoying pests that
join...lol. Have a great life, I'll see you again in a
few, I hope.

Erik and Gary, My apologies for being unable to
complete the Lupin '99 script. Continue the good work,
and I hope to see some more of "The New Lupin III" TV
when I return! Good luck on future TV special
projects, too!

The rest of the list: I hope my presence hasn't been a
bother to any of you, but if it has, too bad!
Hah-hah.... Hope you all have a good time watching
Lupin to your heart's content. 

The closing moments of the greatest anime film ever
made:

Lupin: Sayounara, sayounara!
Clarisse: Sayounara!
Zenigata: Blast it! He has stolen again!
Clarisse: You're mistaken, he has stolen nothing!
Zenigata: On the contrary! He stole something valuable
and priceless...your heart.
Clarisse: Hai.

Sayounara, minna-san...sayounara.
